scripts.build:@ngx-electron: npm run build:@ngx-electron/core && npm run build:@ngx-electron/main && npm run build:@ngx-electron/builder && npm run build:@ngx-electron/schematics && npm run build:@ngx-electron/cli && npm run build:@ngx-electron/redux
scripts.build:@ngx-electron/builder: cpy projects/ngx-electron/builder/README.md dist/ngx-electron/builder && ts-node version.ts ngx-electron/builder && tsc -p projects/ngx-electron/builder
scripts.build:@ngx-electron/cli: cpy projects/ngx-electron/cli/README.md dist/ngx-electron/cli && ts-node version.ts ngx-electron/cli && tsc -p ./projects/ngx-electron/cli
scripts.build:@ngx-electron/main: cpy projects/ngx-electron/main/README.md dist/ngx-electron/main && ts-node version.ts ngx-electron/main && tsc -p ./projects/ngx-electron/main
scripts.build:@ngx-electron/schematics: cpy projects/ngx-electron/schematics/README.md dist/ngx-electron/schematics && ts-node version.ts ngx-electron/schematics && tsc -p projects/ngx-electron/schematics
scripts.build:@ngx-electron/core: cpy projects/ngx-electron/core/README.md dist/ngx-electron/core && ts-node version.ts ngx-electron/core && ng build @ngx-electron/core
scripts.build:@ngx-electron/redux: cpy projects/ngx-electron/redux/README.md dist/ngx-electron/redux && ts-node version.ts ngx-electron/redux && ng build @ngx-electron/redux
scripts.publish:@ngx-electron: npm run publish:@ngx-electron/core && npm run publish:@ngx-electron/main && npm run publish:@ngx-electron/builder && npm run publish:@ngx-electron/schematics && npm run publish:@ngx-electron/cli && npm run publish:@ngx-electron/redux
scripts.publish:@ngx-electron/builder: npm run build:@ngx-electron/builder && npm run npm:scope:ngx-electron && npm publish --access public dist/ngx-electron/builder
scripts.publish:@ngx-electron/cli: npm run build:@ngx-electron/cli && npm run npm:scope:ngx-electron && npm publish --access public dist/ngx-electron/cli
scripts.publish:@ngx-electron/core: npm run build:@ngx-electron/core && npm run npm:scope:ngx-electron && npm publish --access public dist/ngx-electron/core
scripts.publish:@ngx-electron/main: npm run build:@ngx-electron/main && npm run npm:scope:ngx-electron && npm publish --access public dist/ngx-electron/main
scripts.publish:@ngx-electron/schematics: npm run build:@ngx-electron/schematics && npm run npm:scope:ngx-electron && npm publish --access public dist/ngx-electron/schematics
scripts.publish:@ngx-electron/redux: npm run build:@ngx-electron/redux && npm run npm:scope:ngx-electron && npm publish --access public dist/ngx-electron/redux
